content: **edwina cowl** by twinset & purl we are having a 50% off promotion on all our cowl patterns excluding our charity patterns during our cowl kal which is running from october 1st to 31st 2023 use code cowlkal at checkout and join in the kal in our ravelry group https //www ravelry com/groups/twinset--purl-knitting-podcast **pattern information** **sizes ** one size **yarn ** walk collection cottage merino 100% sw merino 100g/360m 394 yds the yarn used is slightly heavier than standard fingering however any 4ply/fingering yarn can be used for this pattern **needles ** 3 5mm / us 4 or the size needed to get gauge 56 cm/22-inch needle **gauge after blocking ** 22 sts and 32 rnds = 10 cm/4-inch in lace pattern however gauge is not crucial for this project and you can weigh your yarn as you go to achieve the maximum repeats of the pattern **measurements after blocking ** 68 cm/27 inches circumference by 46 cm/18 inches length **notions ** stitch marker
